meanings.definition: A mineral consisting of iron oxide hydroxide.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a shiny gothite in the rock sample.
meanings.sent2: The gothite mineral was carefully examined under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The gothite mineral seemed to sparkle like a tiny treasure.
meanings.sent4: The gothite in the ground was like hidden gold waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unique color of gothite made it stand out among the other minerals.

meanings.sent1: The museum displayed a rare gothite in its mineral collection.
meanings.sent2: The gothite specimen was carefully labeled with its origin.
meanings.sent3: The gothite specimen looked like a piece of art in the exhibit.
meanings.sent4: The gothite specimen gleamed under the museum lights.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the gothite specimen fascinated the visitors.
